description:
Use this payload to update your OAuth Web client (manually or via automation).
Review before applying.

curl_template.note: There is no single public REST endpoint that universally edits OAuth client redirect_uris; this template is a starting point if you have an API endpoint in your org that allows patching an OAuth client. Otherwise, update via Google Cloud Console or gcloud CLI.
curl_template.template:
# Replace CLIENT_ID and PROJECT_NUMBER where applicable
# Example (pseudo):
# curl -X PATCH 'https://www.googleapis.com/some/service/v1/projects/PROJECT_NUMBER/clients/CLIENT_ID' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $(gcloud auth print-access-token)' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '@payload.json'
